Keywords: Avengers , Defenders , Illuminati , Mystical
Real Name: Stephen Strange
Special Powers
BRING IN HELP FROM THE MULTIVERSE: Leadership. When Dr. Strange uses it and succeeds, you may instead generate a Avengers Forever #011 Astral Dr. Strange on click #1. If a 6 was rolled, you may instead generate a Avengers Forever #013 Wong on click #1 if there isn't a friendly Avengers Forever #013 Wong on the map.
CLOAK OF LEVITATION: Telekinesis. Telekinesis as FREE, but only to target himself.
KEEPER OF THE TIME STONE: Energy Shield/Deflection, Super Senses.
Trade Dr. Strange Want Dr. Strange

Comments
December 11, 2022
tidge
This is probably not going to be my first choice of a Dr. Strange for force-building, yet I admire the dial design that gives us an offensively-minded version of the character that avoids the typical "Probability Control, Defend (power)" suite of powers. I really wish that TPTB would be more willing to actually assign Flight to the character, even though the CLOAK OF LEVITATION is a fun power. I dislike that the free use of that power means that this set's Wong can't trigger his own power to be placed adjacent to this Dr. Strange. The generation of Astral Dr. Strange (or Wong, if you don't want to start with him) is fine... but not something I would count on.
November 13, 2022
Xombiefaux
[QUOTE=Monkey Joe;12221033]So would you need more than one Wong on your sideline if you wanted to generate another? (after the previous was KO'd of course)[/QUOTE] You don’t need to put any in your sideline. Generation happens from outside of the game
November 11, 2022
hoojeebo
1) No TK after TK is still a thing (you CAN'T TK after being TK'd), and 2) generated figures don't come from your Sideline.
